trans-unit.target: Ofrece compatibilidad en tiempo de diseño para los controles <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner> is a public implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner> base class for the purpose of rendering <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner> es una implementación pública de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner> clase con el fin de representación base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controles en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: It adds the capability of carrying zone information from the associated control into design view, but does not otherwise change the functionality of the parent control.
trans-unit.target: Agrega la capacidad de transportar información de zona desde el control asociado en la vista Diseño, pero no cambia la funcionalidad del control primario.

trans-unit.source: As with other control designers, you can change the design-time rendering of custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls by inheriting from <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner> and overriding the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Como con otros diseñadores de control, puede cambiar la representación en tiempo de diseño de personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controles heredando de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner> e invalidar la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: If you want to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner.CreateViewControl%2A> method, be sure to include the base implementation so as to retain zone information.
trans-unit.target: Si desea invalidar el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner.CreateViewControl%2A> método, no olvide incluir la implementación base con el fin de conservar la información de zona.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a simple custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control that allows the user to change the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ToolTip%2A> property of the target control.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se crea un simple personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control que permite al usuario cambiar la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ToolTip%2A> propiedad del control de destino.

trans-unit.source: The associated <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner> validates the control and replaces the user input text box at design time with a label explaining that it is hidden.
trans-unit.target: El asociado <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner> valida el control y reemplaza el cuadro de texto de entrada de usuario en tiempo de diseño con una etiqueta que explica que está oculto.

trans-unit.source: In order for the custom control to render, the page must have a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control, an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone.ZoneTemplate%2A> for the control to reside in, and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> containing a control for the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> to act on, as shown in the following code example.
trans-unit.target: Para el control personalizado representar, la página debe tener un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> (control), un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> con un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone.ZoneTemplate%2A> para el control que residan en y un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> que contiene un control para la opción de instalación <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> para actuar sobre, tal y como se muestra en el siguiente ejemplo de código.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> to be usable at run time, edit mode must be enabled on the page.
trans-unit.target: Para el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> que se puede usar en tiempo de ejecución, el modo de edición debe estar habilitado en la página.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to do so with a code-behind file.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo hacer esto con un archivo de código subyacente.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> control to render at design time.
trans-unit.target: Crea una copia del control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> asociado que se va a representar en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: A copy of the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> control.
This method is overridden to copy zone information to the view control.
trans-unit.target: Este método se invalida para copiar información de zona en el control de vista.

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the control resides in a zone of type <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase" />, and then gets the markup that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Comprueba que el control está en una zona de tipo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase" /> y que obtiene el marcado que se utiliza para representar el control en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The markup that is used to represent the control at design time, or error markup if the control does not reside in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase" />.
trans-unit.target: El marcado utilizado para representar el control en tiempo de diseño o el marcado del error si el control no reside en <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> control associated with the designer.
Binds the designer to the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Enlaza el diseñador al control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> asociado.
